title: Company workflow
content:
This page explains the company workflow and the steps to perform the following tasks:
  • View workflow and current phase of company
  • Change phase of company

Company workflow

The company workflow describes the different metaphases and phases in the lifecycle of a company. Metaphases represent broad stages in the company's lifecycle, while phases are the specific steps within each stage.

The company workflow relies on business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field affected by a business rule during that phase. For more information about the out-of-the-box business rules defined for the Company workflow, see Company (Vendor) process - Business rules.

View workflow and current phase of company

  1. Click   > Plan > Company. 
  2. Click the name of the company. 
  3. Click the Workflow tab. This displays the workflow, and the current phase of the company is highlighted in blue.

Change phase of company

  1. Click   > Plan > Company. 
  2. Click the name of the company. This directs you to the General tab of the company. 
  3. Click the phase button  on the upper-right side of the page to change the phase to the next phase, or select the appropriate phase from the dropdown. If you are changing the phase to Caution, enter a note in the Caution note box in the General tab.
  4. Click Save.
